titleInfo.title: Civic Symphony Orchestra of Denver in Rehearsal

physicalDescription.extent: 1 item (photograph), 10 x 20 inches, black and white
physicalDescription.note: Title on the front of photograph: ''The Civic Symphony Orchestra of Denver in Rehearsal, Horace Tureman Conductor-Nov. 25, 1938.'' Handwritten on the front of photograph with arrows to indicate who is identified: ''George Wagner, Harold Potashnick, Sam Chernik, Lewis Chernoff, Henry Ginsberg, Ethel Bernstone, Eli Trustman.''

mods.abstract: The members of the Civic Symphony Orchestra of Denver are on stage with their instruments for rehearsal on November 25, 1938. In the top left corner is an insert photograph of the conductor, Horace Tureman. Some members are identified in the margins: George Wagner, Harold Potashnick, Sam Chernick, Lewis Chernoff, Henry Ginsberg, Ethel Bernstone, and Eli Trustman.
mods.accessCondition: Copyright restrictions may apply. User is responsible for all copyright compliance.
